profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

scopecontent.p: This is an account book of David A. Jones, an attorney from Pottsville, Pennsylvania, 1864-1869. The monthly entries note his expenditures for office supplies and household goods, and income for legal services. The volume also includes a note regarding his rental of an office. Most entries are in Welsh.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
